DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Carboxymethylcellulose Ocular Surface Integrity Symptomatic Dry Eye
DOC.criteria: Have use artificial tear least 3 month prior study inclusion Have use preservative free artificial tear least three time daily ( TIB ) least 2 week immediately prior study inclusion Having moderate severe symptom suggestive dry eye Current enrollment investigational drug device study participation study within 3 month prior entry study Moderate severe blepharitis History active sign ocular trauma , ocular infection , ocular inflammation within last 3 month History active sign ocular allergic disease ocular herpes within last year History active sign severe serious ocular condition inflammatory corneal ulcer , recurrent erosion , uveitis time .
